description: Events schedule extracted from PDF calendars; one row per event with event name, original date label, normalized start/end dates, and raw text.

source_pdf.notes: Original PDF file name or identifier where the event was extracted from.

page_number.notes: 1-based page number in the source PDF where this event appears.

event_name.notes: Short human-readable name or title of the event (e.g., 'Community Meeting', 'Youth Workshop').

event_date.notes: Date or date label as written in the PDF (e.g., 'Monday', 'June 3â€“5, 2025', 'All week'). This is for display and fuzzy text filtering. DO NOT use this column for date comparisons - use start_date or end_date instead.

start_date.notes: Normalized calendar date (YYYY-MM-DD) when the event starts, when it can be inferred from the text. USE THIS for date comparisons and filtering (e.g., BETWEEN, >=, <=).

end_date.notes: Normalized calendar date (YYYY-MM-DD) when the event ends; may be the same as start_date or null if unknown. USE THIS for date comparisons and filtering (e.g., BETWEEN, >=, <=).

start_time.notes: 24-hour time (HH:MM:SS or HH:MM) when the event starts, if specified.

end_time.notes: 24-hour time when the event ends, if specified.

raw_text.notes: Original line or snippet of text from the calendar describing this event.

created_at.notes: Timestamp when this row was inserted.
